thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com
thread.title: Mens Wear
thread.title_full: DHgate 的点评人 Mens Wear

author: Mens Wear
title: Mens Wear
text: DHgate gave me direct access to manufacture wholesalers in China. I am able to buy anything from anywhere in the world and get best bargain prices as if i am in China. There is no other website that could offer me better service then DHgate, trust me I have tried it all. Every website have their shortcomings, Some websites will charge you too much, others will not do wholesale, some will only do whole sale with large quantities, and no retail. None of these meet my expectation, Only DHgate was able to deliver more than what I expected and in the right way.
